page.title: 06CANAL HOLIDAYS
page.content: I have a canal boat we use it every week-end and go to the local pub.Every school holiday we go on a holiday and most times it means going down the Hatton twenty one flight of locks.Our boat is forty three feet long it has a Perkins diesel engine.My cabin is near the front of the boat it has bunk-bed,a wardrobe and a desk.My sister and I used to share a cabin but she doesn't come anymore so the cabin is mine.The very front cabin used to be the dogs cabin but one died so the other sleeps with my Mum and Dad.Their cabin is behind mine,it is nearly the same as mine but has two wardrobes and a smaller desk.Next there is the galley.It has a sink and then on the other side there is a lavatory and two cupboards.Then there is our woodburning stove and a long seat.On the other side there is a worksurface.
